thread.title: Dat Damn Natasha
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Dat Damn Natasha

author: Dat Damn Natasha
title: Dat Damn Natasha
text:
I have been a Fabletics VIP member since the company started. The quality is out standing and the attention to detail is superb. I love that all of my leggings have a hidden pocket. My sweatpants get more comfy the more I wash them. The compression pants are compression and not a vice grip to the body. These clothes are truly made for women of every size. I truly love that there is now a Plus Size line a which fit my hips much better.
Keep up the good work!
